attributes.action: Re consider the evidence claiming carbon emmisions are damaging the planet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Specialist scientists as interviewed by Channel 4 TV (8/3/07) claim that Carbon emmissions are not affecting global warming - it is due to Solar activity and Solar & Cosmic changes so please can the Prime Minister explain why the public are being fed the current propaganda claiming that that it is mankind that are damaging the planet and taxing the public in this belief

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
